homepage.title: Home Page
homepage.name: description
homepage.content: Products with images, names and prices.

searchpage.title: Search Page
searchpage.name: description
searchpage.content: A search bar where users can input the name of a product. On form submission, display a list of search results (products) fetched from the API endpoint.

productpage.title: Product Details Page
productpage.name: description
productpage.content: When a user clicks on a product from the search results or product list, they should be redirected to a page that displays detailed information about the product, including the product image, name, price, and description.
